author: sichen
msg: Returning failure instead of error from the refundPayment service to support extensions to OFBIZ-459 - a failed CC refund will not cause the entire refund process to return an error, but instead cascade to the 'filler' payment correctly.

author: ivaynberg
msg: who thought swallowing an exception is a Good Thing???
